experiences.description:
𝘋𝘢𝘪 𝘝𝘪𝘦𝘵 𝘎𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘱 𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯 𝘣𝘶𝘴𝘵𝘭𝘦 𝘧𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘰𝘮𝘺, 𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘭𝘶𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨: 𝘦-𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘤𝘦, 𝘐𝘛 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘶𝘯𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯. 𝘈𝘧𝘵𝘦𝘳 𝘮𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘯 14 𝘺𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘪𝘵𝘴 𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘋𝘢𝘪 𝘝𝘪𝘦𝘵 𝘎𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘱 𝘩𝘢𝘴 𝘣𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘦 𝘢 𝘮𝘶𝘭𝘵𝘪-𝘧𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥 𝘎𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘱 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘬𝘯𝘰𝘸𝘯 𝘢𝘴 𝘢 𝘱𝘰𝘱𝘶𝘭𝘢𝘳 𝘴𝘶𝘱𝘱𝘭𝘪𝘦𝘳 𝘰𝘧 𝘴𝘺𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘮 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘦𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘦𝘥 𝘴𝘰𝘧𝘵𝘸𝘢𝘳𝘦, 𝘴𝘰𝘧𝘵𝘸𝘢𝘳𝘦 𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘪𝘯𝘷𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘢𝘨𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘢𝘭 𝘴𝘱𝘦𝘤𝘪𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘻𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘧𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥 𝘰𝘧 𝘢𝘥𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘵𝘪𝘴𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘶𝘯𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯.

• Handle full cycle of the recruitment process from sourcing to onboarding for all Department of back office.
• Be the contact point to work closely with Hiring managers to understand deeply, analyze and consult recruitment request and hiring needs.
• Enrich the candidate pool and sourcing channels.
• Build and maintain strong relationship with potential candidates.
• Develop and implement initiatives to engage and attract both active and passive candidates.
• Support Employer branding activities such as Job fairs, Career days, Internship program, Mass recruitment campaign.
𝘋𝘢𝘪 𝘝𝘪𝘦𝘵 𝘎𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘱 𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯 𝘣𝘶𝘴𝘵𝘭𝘦 𝘧𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘰𝘮𝘺, 𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘭𝘶𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨: 𝘦-𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘤𝘦, 𝘐𝘛 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘶𝘯𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯. 𝘈𝘧𝘵𝘦𝘳 𝘮𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘯 14 𝘺𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘪𝘵𝘴 𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘋𝘢𝘪 𝘝𝘪𝘦𝘵 𝘎𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘱 𝘩𝘢𝘴 𝘣𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘦 𝘢 𝘮𝘶𝘭𝘵𝘪-𝘧𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥 𝘎𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘱 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘬𝘯𝘰𝘸𝘯 𝘢𝘴 𝘢 𝘱𝘰𝘱𝘶𝘭𝘢𝘳 𝘴𝘶𝘱𝘱𝘭𝘪𝘦𝘳 𝘰𝘧 𝘴𝘺𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘮 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘦𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘦𝘥 𝘴𝘰𝘧𝘵𝘸𝘢𝘳𝘦, 𝘴𝘰𝘧𝘵𝘸𝘢𝘳𝘦 𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘪𝘯𝘷𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘢𝘨𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘯𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘢𝘭 𝘴𝘱𝘦𝘤𝘪𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘻𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘧𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥 𝘰𝘧 𝘢𝘥𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘵𝘪𝘴𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘶𝘯𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯. • Handle full cycle of the recruitment process from sourcing to onboarding for all Department of back office. • Be the contact point to work closely with Hiring managers to understand deeply, analyze and consult recruitment request and hiring needs. • Enrich the candidate pool and sourcing channels. • Build and maintain strong relationship with potential candidates. • Develop and implement initiatives to engage and attract both active and passive candidates. • Support Employer branding activities such as Job fairs, Career days, Internship program, Mass recruitment campaign.

- Develop and execute recruiting plans (Recruiting process, candidates' evaluation, talent pool )
- Implement Recruiting process (Mass recruitment for Operation
Department):
+ Check recruitment requests
+ Collect and filter data 
+ Send email for qualified candidates
+ Directly interview candidates
+ Manage stores for staffs
+ Offer for new Staffs
+ Follow up candidates and handle problems
- Manage job fair's projects for Employer branding and Recruiting 
- Directly work with University's Social Clubs for collaboration
- Support Recruitment team to do some paper works (admin tasks)
- Support Employer Branding in internal activities to motivate staffs
- Develop and execute recruiting plans (Recruiting process, candidates' evaluation, talent pool ) - Implement Recruiting process (Mass recruitment for Operation Department): + Check recruitment requests + Collect and filter data + Send email for qualified candidates + Directly interview candidates + Manage stores for staffs + Offer for new Staffs + Follow up candidates and handle problems - Manage job fair's projects for Employer branding and Recruiting - Directly work with University's Social Clubs for collaboration - Support Recruitment team to do some paper works (admin tasks) - Support Employer Branding in internal activities to motivate staffs

- Prepare teaching lessons and materials before every class 
- Teaching communication courses 
- Assistant for foreign teachers
- Prepare teaching lessons and materials before every class - Teaching communication courses - Assistant for foreign teachers

educations.institution_name: University Of Economics Ho Chi Minh City
